snippet: The Israeli citizen, a Palestinian rights activist, was detained after a visit to Lebanon, on suspicion of an unauthorized visit to an enemy state.
abstract: Majd Kayyal, Arab citizen of Israel and Palestinian rights advocate, is released but ordered to be kept under house arrest by Israeli authorities; Kayyal was detained after a visit to Lebanon, on suspicion of conducting an unauthorized visit to an enemy state and contact with a foreign agent.
lead_paragraph: The Israeli citizen, a Palestinian rights activist, was detained after a visit to Lebanon, on suspicion of an unauthorized visit to an enemy state.

headline.main: Arab-Israeli Activist Is Moved to House Arrest

keywords.value: Adalah, The Legal Center for Arab Minority Rights in Israel
keywords.name: organizations
